name: Lullaby (Impostor Studios, Solo Byte Games)
description:
Submitted to Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2 You are Boombox Mike. After a big party, you woke up in a strange place only your boombox and weird tape next to you. You have to try to find a way out to get home. Maybe it is all just a bad trip and you are still at that party...

Dark creatures loom the halls but for some reason, they are not interested in you as long as you keep that strange tape playing. To do that you will sometimes have to find a safe place to rewind the tape, but don´t let the creatures near you!

Rewind the tape to keep the music playing. As long as the music plays the enemies stay calm. Pick up keys to get through doors. And find the exit. CONTROLS KEYBOARDCONTROLLERLMB / EA / RTRewind MusicW A S DLeft Stick / D PadMoveFSelectFullscreenESC / PStartPause Menu INFO
  • Full controller support
  • No mouse needed
  • Fullscreen 
CREDITS

Tobi Wittmann - Programmer / Sound

David Grueneis (SoloByteGames)  - Programmer / Art
